name: notes_app
description: **A Full Stack Application for Managing Daily Notes**   Seamlessly perform CRUD operations with modular, adaptable, and scalable software design.

scripts.dev: SET NODE_ENV=development && concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.build: npm i --production=false && npm i --production=false --prefix client && npm i --production=false --prefix server && npm run build --prefix client
